objects.text:
• Smart Home Essential
• Multiple Drying Modes
• Energy-Efficient Technology
• Large Capacity Drum

product_details.name: Insignia Ultra-Modern High-Efficiency Ventless Dryer - Smart Home Essential
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white modern design with large digital display and intuitive controls
• 🎯 Multiple drying modes: My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, Towels, and more
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel and clear maintenance instructions
• 📱 Digital LED display with time remaining and cycle status
• 🌟 Large capacity drum with dark glass door for visibility
• 💨 Advanced moisture sensing for precise drying results
• ⚙️ Adjustable temperature settings for various fabric types
• 🔄 Reversible door design for flexible installation
• 💡 User-friendly control panel with rotating selector dial
• 🏠 Perfect for apartments, condos, and spaces without external venting

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and eye-catching layout with a modern aesthetic designed to highlight a home appliance product. The top section begins with an attention-grabbing tagline (`tagline`) in vibrant yellow. Below it, the main heading (`heading`) is in white uppercase serif text, emphasizing the product name. A bulleted feature list (`description`) offers key benefits in smaller white text. Beneath that is a highlighted call to action (`subheading`) and a small disclaimer (`disclaimer`). A large product image (`product_image`) is placed prominently on the right. The price (`price`) is boldly displayed in yellow near the bottom, coupled with a bright call-to-action button (`cta_button`) containing text (`cta`). The background is styled with deep blue hues and geometric overlays.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#1A3A54`
- Deep Blue: `#0D2840`
- Sky Blue: `#124A7C`
- Highlight Yellow: `#F8C537`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a modern, minimalistic dryer with a sleek design, emphasizing a monochromatic and futuristic aesthetic. The dominant color is a crisp, clean white (#FFFFFF), covering the main body of the unit, which enhances its sleek and hygienic look. The glass on the door and control panel contributes deep black (#1C1C1C) and glossy charcoal shades (#2E2E2E), adding contrast and sophistication. Accent colors such as digital blue (#00BFFF), soft orange (#FFA07A), and minimal red accents (#FF4500) in the control dial provide highlights that guide user interaction. This combination offers a palette that feels clean, high-tech, and attention-grabbing—ideal for ad banners.
